card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Faerie Life
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Seventh Tower
card.text: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Metamorph

card.name: Bolshack Cross NEX
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Players can't summon creatures that cost 4 or less.

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following. :► Search your deck. Choose a spell that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then cast that spell for no cost. :► Search your deck. Choose a cross gear that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then generate that cross gear for no cost.

card.name: Cyber A Irons
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 5 cards. ■ Whenever you put other water creatures into the battle zone, this creature can't be blocked that turn. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Aqua Burster
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shrine of Rebirth
card.text: ■ Put up to 2 cards from your graveyard into your mana zone.

card.name: Deepsea Searcher
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Jasmine, Mist Faerie
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Ryusei Kaiser, the Eternal
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Each of your creatures gets "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's creatures are put tapped. ■ When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it instead.

card.name: Bolbalzak Ex
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, untap all cards in your mana zone.

card.name: Insight Indigo Kaiser
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent summons a creature or casts a spell, this turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

card.name: GILL Supergalactic Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 9000 or less and destroy them. Then choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Dondon Vacuuming Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If the card revealed this way was a fire or nature card, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hirameki Program
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your non-psychic creatures. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature that costs 1 more than the destroyed creature. You may put that creature into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Katsuking MAX, Outlaw Caliber
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 8000 or less. ■ During your turn, you may summon a creature from your mana zone. ■ Double Breaker ■ Doron Go ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Outlaw" in their Card Name

card.name: Don Katsudon, Outlaw
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Power Attacker ■ Doron Go ■ You can't put other exile creatures that have "Outlaw" in their Card Name

card.name: Berserk, Sanctuary Odin
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put any number of cards from your graveyard into your mana zone. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Ultramotion Rage Crystal
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Draw 2 cards. :► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.
